repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.7

# Install app
ADD Makefile requirements.txt /speid/
RUN mkdir /.aptible/
ADD .aptible/Procfile /.aptible/Procfile
WORKDIR /speid
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -qU pip
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -q gunicorn
RUN make install

# Add repo contents to image
ADD . /speid/

ENV PORT 3000
EXPOSE $PORT
